name: Awesome Ice Cream Donut Cake Pop Dessert Maker
name_original: Awesome Ice Cream Donut Cake Pop Dessert Maker
description:
Ice Cream Donut Cake Pops, Lets get to baking!

Features:
- Ring and Filled Donut Pops...
- Lots of Flavors
- Mix ingredients
- Decorations: Chocolates, Fruits, Frosting, candies, creams, sprinkles
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!
- and More!!!!!

Download Awesome Ice Cream Donut Cake Pop Dessert Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Ice Cream Donut Cake Pop Dessert Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
